thread.title: Ellen DeGeneres feels Dev Patel should be named the SEXIEST man alive
thread.title_full: Ellen DeGeneres feels Dev Patel should be named the SEXIEST man alive

author: IANS
title: Ellen DeGeneres feels Dev Patel should be named the SEXIEST man alive
text:
Ellen DeGeneres feels Dev Patel should be named the SEXIEST man alive Is Dev Patel the sexiest man ever? Ellen DeGeneres feels so... By IANS | Published: January 8, 2017 7:28 pm In Focus: Freida Pinto poses at a vineyard! 
Popular American talk show host Ellen DeGeneres thinks Indo-British actor Dev Patel should be named the sexiest man alive. He appeared on The Ellen DeGeneres Show a few days back to promote his film Lion and DeGeneres encouraged him to start a campaign for Sexiest Man Alive. Ellen said, “Because you look so good, and people are saying you look buff and everything, I had this made for you.” DeGeneres then presented the 26 year-old actor with a fake magazine cover of him as People’s annual hot man honouree. 
Ellen added, “You can hand this out, It’ll help your career!” The Slumdog Millionaire star responded back swiftly, “I’ll give it to my mom, and she’ll put it at the entrance to her house. This is very awkward.” Ellen DeGeneres laughed and said, “You don’t understand Hollywood, right?” ALSO READ – Dev Patel says Indian filmmakers have to work like Aamir Khan to push boundaries 
Dev Patel is currently on cloud nine after being nominated for the Oscars (in the Best Supporting Actor Category for his film Lion ). He plays the role of Saroo Brierley in the movie, who tries to reconnect with his family after being separated. The actor has been nominated along with the likes of Jeff Bridges and Simon Helberg. And he feels it is a great thing to happen to him at 26. Dev’s Lion has been loved by critics for its sensitive tale. It also has Indian actors like Nawazuddin Siddiqui , Priyanka Bose and Tannishtha Chatterjee.
